isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Bunk Speakers With 48 And 60 Inch Box Sleeper

svcproc.title: Bunk Speakers With 48 And 60 Inch Box Sleeper
svcproc.para: Audio power is fed to the front bunk speaker volume control on circuits 86AR/86AB and 86AS/86AC. Audio power is fed to the rear bunk speaker volume control on circuits 86AU/86AP and 86AT/86AE. Audio power is then fed to the front bunk speaker on circuits 86AD and 86AH. Audio power is fed to the rear bunk speaker on circuits 86AL and 86AK.
When headphones are plugged into the headset jack, the speakers are switched out of the circuit and the headphones are connected along with additional resistance and capacitance.
